name: Race Queen 3D
description:
The best piano-jumping game ever!

Want to play the piano but the old way is too boring? Let’s join our newest amazing music action game: Race Queen. This game will give you a chance to be the best race-girl in town. Listen to the beat, look carefully at the piano key, run and jump as far as you can. Don’t forget to collect our sweet bonus.

Are you ready to join this amazing piano race? Download now to see what really happened!

Gameplay:
Hold and drag to keep the beautiful girl run on the endless piano keys. Train your eye coordination when the keys suddenly move.

Game features:
- Beautiful background music
- Lovely piano theme
- Super easy gameplay to relax.
